com.communote.server.api.core.event

Interface Event

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DistributableEvent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEvent, AllUsersTopicAccessRightsChangedEvent, AssignedBlogRoleChangedEvent, BlogCreatedEvent, ClientStatusChangeEvent, DiscussionChangedEvent, EntityTopicAccessRightsChangedEvent, LocalizationChangedEvent, ManagerGainedTopicAccessRightsChangedEvent, PropertyEvent, ResourceBundleChangedEvent, RestartServiceEvent, TaskScheduledEvent, TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent, TopicHierarchyEvent, UserAuthenticatedEvent, UserStatusChangedEvent, UserToTopicRoleMappingChangedEvent

    public interface Event
extends Serializable
    Defines an event. An event can be triggered by using the EventDispatcher and observed by registering an appropriate EventListener to the EventDispatcher.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
